mapper.select: SELECT h.hotel_code, h.hotel_name, h.phone, c.korean_name as country, h.address, h.price, h.is_used FROM TB_HOTEL_INFO h LEFT JOIN TB_COUNTRY_INFO c ON h.country_code = c.country_code WHERE AND IS_USED != 'N' ORDER BY h.hotel_code LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT h.hotel_code, h.hotel_name, h.phone, c.korean_name as country, h.address, h.price, h.is_used FROM TB_HOTEL_INFO h LEFT JOIN TB_COUNTRY_INFO c ON h.COUNTRY_CODE = c.COUNTRY_CODE WHERE hotel_code = #{hotelCode} AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM happytravel.TB_EMPLOYMENT_INFO WHERE EMP_ID = #{empId} AND (DEPT_CODE = 3000 OR DEPT_CODE = 9000) AND STATUS_CODE = 1000 )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_HOTEL_INFO ( hotel_code, hotel_name, phone, country_code, address, price, is_used ) VALUES ( (SELECT CONCAT('H', LPAD(IFNULL(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(hotel_code, 2) AS UNSIGNED)) + 1, 1), 3, '0')) FROM TB_HOTEL_INFO h), #{hotel_name}, #{phone}, #{country_code}, #{address}, #{price}, #{is_used} );
